attributes.action: Allow muslims to have islamic slaughter houses. Stunned animals are not Halal.
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to allow people to follow and act their beliefs and religon.

Around 80% of all Halal meat in U.K are stunned. Animals which are stunned then slaughtered are not Halal and should not be labelled as Halal.

Allow muslims to have their place to slaughter animals according to their religion. All customers need to know where the meat has come from and if its Halal or not,.

Also businesses should not be selling Halal meat to customers who are not aware that the meat is Halal, all products need to be packaged fairly. As  this has been going on recently and is all over the news about major businesses.


Please sign this petition and share with friends and family.
